faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find quick and easy answers to the questions you may have about our services.

faqs.question: Is Sector 15 Hisar a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 15 Hisar is a well-developed and family-friendly residential area with strong connectivity and essential amenities.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 15?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available for rent.

faqs.question: Is Sector 15 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the locality offers a peaceful environment with schools, parks, hospitals, and markets nearby.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 15 Hisar?
faqs.answer: Rent depends on house size, condition, and location, ranging from moderate to premium segments.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent?
faqs.answer: Both furnished and unfurnished houses may be available depending on current listings.

faqs.question: Do rental houses include parking facilities?
faqs.answer: Most independent houses in Sector 15 provide dedicated parking space.

faqs.question: How does Deal Acres help tenants?
faqs.answer: Deal Acres offers verified listings, local insights, and tenant-focused rental support.

faqs.question: Is Sector 15 well connected to other parts of Hisar?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 15 has good road connectivity and access to public transport.

faqs.question: What documents are required to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Typically, ID proof, address proof, and a signed rental agreement are required.
